topic.title: HP Helion Openstack Carrier Grade (Beta): Stopping and Restarting Instances

body.p: Users can stop and restart instances as needed.

section.title: Stop an instance

li.p: Launch the HP Helion Openstack Horizon Dashboard.
Click the Project dashboard, then the System panel, then the Instances link.
In the Instances screen, for the instance you want to modify, click the arrow icon in the Actions menu and select Shut Off Instance.
The status of the instance reports Shutoff.

section.p: Note: Many of the commands on the More menu are not available for a stopped instance.

li.p: Launch the HP Helion Openstack Horizon Dashboard.
Click the Project dashboard, then the System panel, then the Instances link.
In the Instances screen, for the instance you want to modify, click the arrow icon in the Actions menu and select Start Instance.
The status of the instance reports Active.
